title: The Missing Silverware
description: Noble House Renn has reported a series of petty thefts — silverware, small decorative items, and a gold candlestick. They suspect one of their domestic staff. House Chamberlain Veli wants the matter resolved without public scandal or false accusations.

turns.narrative: The thefts began six weeks ago, always on evenings when a specific weekly social gathering is held at the house. Items go missing during the party chaos. Veli provides a list of all twelve staff members and notes that two have recently paid off personal debts significantly above their salary level.
turns.choice_a: Interview the two high-profile staff members first
turns.consequence_a: One — the scullery assistant Benn — becomes immediately flustered when asked about his debts. He is clearly not a good liar.
turns.choice_b: Review the household entry and exit logs for the six theft evenings
turns.consequence_b: The logs reveal a pattern: the same service corridor is used on every theft evening to reach the silverware cabinet by a route that bypasses the main serviced areas.

turns.narrative: Both paths lead to Benn, who is eventually identified as the thief. When confronted privately, he breaks immediately and explains: his mother is ill and the medical costs were beyond his means. He is deeply ashamed.
turns.choice_a: Report Benn to Veli and let the household decision govern the outcome
turns.consequence_a: Veli, moved by the explanation, arranges for the Medical Quarter to cover Benn's mother's costs and Benn repays the value of stolen goods through wage deductions rather than prosecution.
turns.choice_b: Negotiate a private restitution agreement yourself before involving Veli
turns.consequence_b: Benn agrees to return all items still in his possession and write an itemised restitution promise for the rest.

turns.narrative: Veli asks why the household's security allowed this to happen for six weeks unnoticed.
turns.choice_a: Recommend a basic staff possessions locker policy to prevent future incidents
turns.consequence_a: Lockers are installed. All staff store personal items there. Impromptu searches become standard.
turns.choice_b: Recommend Veli create a voluntary staff hardship fund that helps workers avoid desperation-driven theft
turns.consequence_b: Veli is moved by the suggestion and creates a small discretionary fund. Three other staff immediately apply for minor hardship support.

veli_decided.description: Veli handled Benn's case with surprising mercy.

hardship_fund.description: Staff hardship fund created. Three staff immediately helped.

risk_matrix.critical_failure: The attempt failed quietly. The situation remains unresolved.

conclusion: Veli handled Benn's case with surprising mercy.
